title.bibl: Lietuva, June 22, 1895. "Lietuva," the First Lithuanian Colony, Grand Prarie, Arkansas

notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

div.bibl: Leituva, June 22, 1895. "LIETUVA," THE FIRST LITHUANIAN COLONY, GRAND PRARIE, ARKANSAS

body.p: Up to the present time twenty-four Lithuanian families have bought farms and ten of them are now living on them. J. Balcewiczius, a priest, started to build the church on his own farm. We are helping in the building of the church with our labor. The church is not far from Hazen, Arkansas, where the land is fertile and crops can be raised abundantly.
(This Lithuanian colony was started by A. Olszewski, editor and publisher of Lietuva.)
